organizations.name: The International Telecommunication Union (ITU)
quotes: The International Telecommunication Union (ITU) is one of the many entities that recognise the multiple dimensions of the digital divide and work toward facilitating digital inclusion of marginalised groups. More details at ITU, Digital Inclusion, available at https://www.itu.int/en/ITU-D/Digital-Inclusion/Pages/default.aspx
